## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Oil Extraction System at (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) - extracts crude oil (currently without power)
- Storage tank at (22.5, 40.5) - stores extracted crude oil
- Pipe network connecting pumpjack to storage tank (positions: (19.5,38.5), (18.5,38.5), (21.5,38.5), (20.5,38.5))

### Partial Power Plant at (17.5, 31.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (17.5, 31.0) - currently not functional (missing steam engine and water input)

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement errors
- Cannot place steam engines on water or occupied tiles - carefully check terrain before placement
- Offshore pumps must be placed adjacent to water - verify water presence at target location
- Entities must be placed within 10 tiles of player position - move closer before placing

### Inspection errors
- Storage tanks show empty when inspected - this is normal before fluid systems are fully operational
- Pumpjack shows NO_POWER status - needs to be connected to a powered electrical network

### Power plant construction
- Steam engines must be placed adjacent to boilers with proper alignment
- Boilers require both fuel input and water connection to function
- Complete power plants need all components: offshore pump → boiler → steam engine

### General tips
- When removing misplaced entities, check inventory to confirm successful removal
- For fluid systems, verify all pipe connections are properly linked
- Check entity status messages for specific operational issues
